sources.title: They Made Me a Killer
sources.description: A man arrested for bank robbery escapes and tries to track down the real culprits. You can find out more at IMDB.com .

sources.title: They Made Me a Killer (1946)
sources.description: A fugitive receives help from a victim's sister as he tries to clear his name of robbery and murder charges. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/they-made-me-a-killer-1946/

sources.title: They Made Me a Killer (1946) BARARA BRITTON
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Lowery, Barbara Britton, Lola Lane
Director: William C. Thomas

A down-on-his-luck grease monkey
unwittingly becomes the getaway driver for a violent
bank heist and is framed for murder!

metadata.Plot: Tom Durling is falsely accused of a bank robbery and murder. In order to clear his name, and that of the brother of his fiancée who was killed in the course of the robbery by the robbers, he flees. With the aid of his fiancée, June Reynolds, he sets out to find the needed evidence to convict the actual criminals.
metadata.Writer: Daniel Mainwaring, Winston Miller, Kae Salkow
metadata.Actors: Robert Lowery, Barbara Britton, Lola Lane
